Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute near King Drive/65th
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses temp. rerouted NB: King Dr., 67th, Cottage Grove, 61st, and King Dr.; SB: King Dr., 63rd, Cottage Grove, 67th, and King Dr. nr King Dr./65th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near King Drive/65th due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via King Drive, 67th, Cottage Grove, 61st, and King Drive.

Southbound buses will operate via King Drive, 63rd, Cottage Grove, 67th, and King Drive.

Allow extra travel time.
